name: inBuild
headline: Workflow Automation for Construction Finance
description: inBuild boosts revenue for home builders by automating the thousands of invoices they receive for every project.  For example, when a subcontractor sends an invoice for work they completed, inBuild checks the cost against the project budget, handles any approvals, pays the bill, and updates Quickbooks.

founders.name: Ty Sharp, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder & CEO at inBuild. 

Previously CFO at Sweeney Development, an Aspen-based General Contractor building $350M in construction volume. 

Expressing my creativity through building things that people love.

founders.name: Ian Sharp, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder of inBuild. Supercharging financial management for builders.

inBuild Makes Billing Easy
# Financial Software Made for Modern Builders
Spend time building, not processing documents.
  * Save 15+ hours per month on pay applications
  * Centralize your financials and define cash flow
  * Eliminate manual data entry with a digital assistant


[Book a Demo](https://www.inbuild.ai/</contact/demo>)
![Application components from inBuild. Invoice, description, and project attributes. Timestamp 1:20](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/64f5a1126661d82615c7b7d1_intro_video_thumbnail.webp)
### Project Managers and Financial Controllers at Leading Builders Use inBuild
![David Wilkes Builders Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/64ef1211b59f5bc5459660fa_david_wilkes_builders.svg)![Finbro Construction Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/64ef12117fd6b378bd1e6aeb_finbro_construction.webp)![Hendrickson Construction Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/64ef12126b4ce832c9405574_hendrickson_construction.webp)![Legacy Custom Homes Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/64ef121183e5f0a01023a44c_legacy_custom_homes.webp)![Regan Construction Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/64ef12667513babb5e5f7602_regan_construction.webp)![Vertias Fine Homes Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/64ef1281c8d899bfe3d9d3d8_veritas_fine_homes.webp)
[![Sweeney Development Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/65c5600cad3faecf66753978_SweeenyRE-LOGOweb.jpg)Click for Case Study](https://www.inbuild.ai/</case-studies>)![2nd Story Renovations Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/64ef1212c8d899bfe3d94b3c_2nd_story_renovations.webp)![G.M. Johnson Construction Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/64ef12125959e2d30fc58418_gm_johnson.webp)![JT Builders Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/64ef121109266e7fa05d3e77_jt_builders.webp)[![Keelty Construction Inc. Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/64ef12117576e9baae9e8c3d_keelty_construction.webp)Click for Case Study](https://www.inbuild.ai/</case-studies>)
## Hey, we're inBuild. Who are you? 
### Owner
#### You need accurate financials. 
Accuracy and cost savings are key. Never miss an invoice, pay application, change order, contract, lien, or payment again.
### Project Manager
#### You want to code from anywhere.
No need to spend more time at the office. Submit, review, and manage project financials from the field (or the King Ranch).
### Financial Controller
#### You love an organized process.
Centralize your process. Documents are automatically processed, so you can focus on the bigger picture.
### Accountant
#### You rely on other platforms.
Connect with your other financial platforms. Sync processed documents with a single click. No more translating from cost code to account.
## Simplify Your Entire Process
[Invoicing](https://www.inbuild.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Workflows](https://www.inbuild.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Integrations](https://www.inbuild.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
### Automatic Document Processing
Documents are automatically uploaded and processed from your email. Sit back and relax while we take down the key details for you.
### Job Cost Tracking
A schedule of values that updates for you, giving the most accurate and up-to-date financial status for your projects.
### Pay Application Creation
Export pay applications with a single click. Completely customizable, so you can give your clients what they need.
![Artistic representation of inBuild's invoicing features: automatic document processing, job cost tracking, and pay application creation.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/65419c257012b18f688e6ded_invoicing_layout_03.png)
### Review and Approval
Send documents to other users for review and approval. PMs need only be concerned with documents relevant to their projects.
### Electronic Filing Cabinet
Easily search and retrieve past invoices anytime, making it easy to stay organized and audit-proof your business operations.
### Contracts, Change Orders, Liens
Create and manage the most common documents. Generate based on invoice data and send for signature using our [integrations](https://www.inbuild.ai/</integrations>).
![Artistic representation of inBuild's management features: review and approval, electronic filing cabinet, and common document management.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/65429320b913d2fff3fcb3f7_management_layout_01.png)
### Financial Platforms
Sync with your software of choice using our[ integrations](https://www.inbuild.ai/</integrations>). Reconcile billing the way you always have, while skipping the data entry.
### Document Management
Connect with other platforms to manage and track documents. Increase your redundancy and have control over your data.
### Mobile App
Use the mobile app to snap a picture of any document. Upload from anywhere and it will be processed when you're back in the office.
![Artistic representation of all of the technologies inBuild connects with.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/6542998e028c33676ad9aeb6_syncing_layout_01.png)
## Support so Good, It'll Blow Your Mind
### Experts in the USA
Don't get stuck on another call with support thousands of miles away. **Our experts are****based in the United States and have industry experience****.** Effective communication and quick resolution are our specialty.
### Lightning-Fast
No more waiting on hold. **Our team responds within 5 minutes**. Need specialized training or more intensive support? We offer same-day video conferencing to solve even the most complex issues.
### Unmatched Knowledge
No matter the question, our team will get you the most accurate and helpful information. From product support to recommendations on best practices, **we have a wealth of information you can lean onto improve your process.**
![JT Builders Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/64ef121109266e7fa05d3e77_jt_builders.webp)
![Jake Walsh and family of JT Builders](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/64ef1d36fbbf88b5f3c9746d_jake_walsh.webp)
My construction company was spending a minimum of 16 hours a month on managing our project's finances... That is until we fully integrated inBuild AI into our systems. We have cut that time burden to less than 4 hours a month with no inaccuracies! The AI component is absolutely incredible at saving us time and potential errors. Try inBuild! Do it... seriously do it!
Jake Walsh, JT Builders
You often hear 'under promise and over deliver'. I don't believe that is the business model of inBuild, but they continually over deliver. When was the last time you heard 'we don't currently offer that, but are working on it and should have that live soon' or 'we like that idea, mind if we incorporate that?' When was the last time you got excited about computer software for accounting? Both of these happen regularly thanks to inBuild!
Joey Zikor, Finbro Construction
![Finbro Construction Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/64ef12117fd6b378bd1e6aeb_finbro_construction.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64eee57d85e25dda1a39e7fa/64ef1f1f3fd160f94c7c18e4_joey_zikor.webp)
## Still have questions? Want to talk it through?
## Let's Chat
There's a team of experts always ready to chat through any or all of the following:
  * Technical requirements
  * Customized demos
  * Pricing information
  * inBuild product capabilities


## Schedule a Call
Our experts will be in touch to provide a personalized overview of inBuild.

[ ![](https://capterra.s3.amazonaws.com/assets/images/gdm-badges/sa-customer_support-2024.png) ](https://www.inbuild.ai/<https:/www.softwareadvice.com/accounting/inbuild-profile/>)

generated_description:
**inBuild: Revolutionizing Construction Finance with AI-Enhanced Automation**

Founded in 2021 and backed by Y Combinator's Batch W23, inBuild is reshaping the landscape of construction finance with a laser focus on workflow automation. Headquartered in Wilmington, DE, the company is a compact yet dynamic team of 12, led by Group Partner Brad Flora.

### Mission
inBuild’s mission is straightforward: automate the complexity of construction finance workflow. In an industry where managing invoices from multiple subcontractors can feel like herding cats, inBuild steps in to streamline the entire process. When a subcontractor submits an invoice, inBuild checks it against the budget, processes approvals, makes payments, and updates QuickBooks—all without the tedious manual entry.

### Products & Features
The platform offers several key features designed to save time and enhance efficiency:
- **Invoicing Inbox**: Manage all incoming invoices seamlessly.
- **Accounts Payable Hub**: Centralize your financial operations.
- **Project Budgeting**: Keep your budgets on track without the headaches.
- **Instant Pay Applications**: Quick and customizable export of pay applications.
- **Mobile App**: Upload and manage documents from anywhere.

inBuild integrates smoothly with other platforms such as Procore, QuickBooks, DocuSign, and many more, making it easier to sync financial workflows.

### Why Choose inBuild?
**Time-Saving Automation**: Users report saving over 15 hours a month on pay applications alone. Such efficiency allows teams to focus on what truly matters—building.

**User-Centric Design**: The software is crafted for modern builders, enabling project managers and financial controllers to manage documents from the field, ultimately simplifying interactions and enhancing productivity.

### Testimonials
The feedback suggests that inBuild isn’t just making promises—it’s over-delivering on them. Users like Jake Walsh from JT Builders have significantly cut down their financial management time with inBuild, transforming what used to be a 16-hour task into less than 4 hours monthly, all while ensuring accuracy.

### Support
With a support team based in the U.S., inBuild boasts a response time of under five minutes, providing technical assistance and updates in real-time, eliminating frustrating offshore support due to time zone differences.

### The Takeaway
In a nutshell, inBuild is more than just a financial software—it’s evolving the construction finance industry through AI-enhanced automation. For builders looking to streamline finances and eliminate manual processes, inBuild is the tool that promises accuracy, efficiency, and a modern approach to old-fashioned problems.

For more information, you can visit their website at [inbuild.ai](https://www.inbuild.ai/).
